thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 31 of 2268
thread.title: Carolyn Wright

author: Carolyn Wright
title: Carolyn Wright
text: I was amazed how quickly my faux wood blinds arrived. I ordered on Sunday 15 Jan & they arrived on 18th Jan. Good quality blind although it took us a few hours to put up in the bathroom due to the location ! I was a little disappointed with the length of the blinds as these were supposed to be 10-15m shorter than the inside measurement of the window but they are too long and the bottom doesn't sit correctly as folds on the window ledge as are slightly longer than the size ordered. I suppose this is to do with the size of the slats?
